descriptionlist.description: Install Procursus On Unc0ver Without Computer.

Steps:
1) Install The Pacakage
2) Get Root In MTerminal
3) Run The Command Uncursus-Installer

changelog.change: 80% Of The Script Got Rewritted, Removed Unused Code, Switch The Method Used For Install Procursus To Migration That mean No Restore Rootfs Needed So Tweaks/Apps Rae Now Saved Saved
